page.title: 17Offwell: modern haymaking
page.content: When we do the mowing we use the Massey Ferguson 165 with the mower. The mower is a Fahr KM22. It was made in West Germany. For kicking the hay, we use the Satopian PZ haybob 300 behind the 165 Massey Ferguson. When we bale the hay we use the Massey Ferguson model 20-8 Baler and the 290 Massey Ferguson tractor. Then we use the loader. It is a Quicke 2230 with a Perry loader attachment in the Universal 640D+. The tractor that pull the trailers are MF250 and 290MF. The trailers are FW Wheatley L+D, Berter Borough. Taskers and Weeks trailers. The elevator is a 3 hp Lister Blackstone 4 cycle engine Biggs and a Stratton made in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, USA. We use the elevator when the hay stack gets too high for us.
